forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy this morning, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy this morning, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 63F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High near 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High around 60F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 16C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 61F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 48F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 63F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 9C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 49F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 63F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 49F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 16C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 47F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High near 15C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 59F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High around 15C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
